preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from clinlims.project where name = 'Viral Load Results';

changeSet.comment: Insert clinlims project viral load study

changeSet.author: CI OpenELIS developers group

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from clinlims.dictionary_category where local_abbrev = 'Reason for Viral Load Request';

changeSet.comment: Insert answers to Viral Load request category: Reason for Viral Load Request
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO clinlims.dictionary_category (id,description,lastupdated,local_abbrev,name) VALUES (400,'Reason for Viral Load Request', now(),'vlReason','Reason for Viral Load Request');

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from clinlims.dictionary where dict_entry = 'Valid';

changeSet.comment: Insert answers to Viral Load request reason and 'Valid' result
